mapper.select: SELECT r.rno, r.vno, r.uno, r.title, r.content, r.regdate, r.updatedate, u.name AS userName, p.cno, p.serial, p.giga, p.price, p.phone_name, p.phone_size, p.phone_weight, p.camera, p.battery, p.memory, p.display, p.status, p.manufacturer, p.color, p.cpu, p.options, p.release_date, p.os, p.description1, p.description2, p.security, p.waterproof FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.uno = u.uno JOIN product p ON r.vno = p.cno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (vno, uno, title, content, regdate, updatedate) VALUES (#{vno}, #{uno}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
